articles.title: Finland to join NATO as Allied Foreign Ministers meet - NATO HQ
articles.description: Finland will become the 31st member of NATO on Tuesday (4 April 2023), immediately preceding a two-day meeting of Allied Foreign Ministers. Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg welcomed Finland’s imminent accession, saying: “It will be a good day for Finland’s …

articles.author: Fiona Jackson
articles.title: Has NASA found life on Mars? Perseverance collects Martian soil - Daily Mail
articles.description: The car-sized Perseverance rover cored down into the sediment of Jezero Crater on the Red Planet, marking the first sample of its new campaign.
articles.content:
NASA's Perseverance Rover has collected a sample of Martian rock to be returned to Earth which could contain signs of life.
But don't get too excited yet, as this particular tube won't reach a terre… [+9183 chars]

articles.title: 262-foot asteroid among 5 nearing Earth, reveals NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: The upcoming week will see some gigantic asteroids racing towards Earth. NASA has revealed their size, speed, and distance. Check all the details here.
